/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about special rating considerations in IDES claim, including
rating decisions for IDES participants who are not on active duty
rating issues that are unique to IDES cases
decisions involving coexisting claimed and referred disabilities
addressing referred conditions for PEB purposes only
, and
denying SC for a referred condition in a proposed rating
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Proposed Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H
